name: Anthurium regale
description: Anthurium regale Ã— luxurians is a hybrid epiphytic aroid created by crossing Anthurium regale and Anthurium luxurians. It belongs to the Araceae family and features large, velvety, dark green to almost black leaves (40-80 cm long) with prominent white or silver veins that create stunning contrast. The leaves have a distinctive velvety texture. The plant displays an upright, compact growth habit and typically reaches 60-120 cm in height. It produces small, inconspicuous flowers typical of aroids. In terrariums or indoor settings, this plant adds dramatic interest with its large, velvety, veined leaves. It's extremely popular among aroid enthusiasts for its striking appearance and hybrid vigor.
